title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 807.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 807.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to any program certified by the Office to
provide addiction treatment services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
807.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 19, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 51, eff. 12/19/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
